title: TPACK-Based Technology Integration Instructional Design Module Development for Geometry Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic geometric concepts, secondary education experience, digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Development of a technology-integrated module for improving geometry instruction for corporate educators, including ADDIE model-based module design and field application evaluation

learning_goals: Enhancement of instructional design skills by integrating the three core elements (technology, content, pedagogy) of the TPACK framework.
Acquisition of competency in using digital tools (e.g., GeoGebra) to effectively convey geometric concepts.
Cultivation of the ability to design and execute technology-integrated activities that promote learner engagement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
